name: Super Vadimka III Enter ALJ
description:
The symbol of fear of horror, Dr. Kulechek, has returned again to mock the poor Vadim to conquer a new path of terrible and dangerous survival will he be able to go through the last nightmare of new bosses and enemies trying to mock the hero again. But now the hero has a new powerful mystical gadget, whose name is ALJ...

Enable Enter ALJ you will need to press the 0 button

1. Sixaxis is a dog, she is the owner for Vadim - Sixaxis-XHZ-34482-LFELY_VADIM_KA_SIXAXIS
2. Rogue Machines - This equipment is created for Dr. Kulechka in fact, these rogue monsters are kind ways to crush enemies and spikes.- 72-XHZ-MEGA-XAKER

Super Vadimka III Enter ALJ - is an action-platformer in the horror genre with side scrolling developed by VadimBallzGame the game took place on May 10, 2022. The game was developed in 5 months and is also a continuation of the previous parts. Super Vadimka and Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik to the third part you will have to pass the steep shores of fear of horror also the possibility of cows you can throw a blue ball and sticks, shoot bosses try to survive the nightmares.
